snippet: The style and shopping magazine will soon announce a site to shop through directly, instead of switching to the sites of retailers.
abstract: Style and shopping magazine Lucky will introduce a site on Aug 17 that will direct readers to buy clothing and accessories directly from more than a dozen retailers, instead of switching to their sites.
lead_paragraph: The style and shopping magazine will soon announce a site to shop through directly, instead of switching to the sites of retailers.

headline.seo: Shopping With Lucky Will Soon Require Less Clicking
headline.main: Guided by Lucky Magazine, Shopping Will Soon Require Less Clicking
headline.print_headline: Guided by the Magazine Lucky, Shopping Will Soon Require Less Clicking
